    • Method Detail

      • create

        public abstract void create()
        Called when added to the world

      • get

        public <T extends com.badlogic.ashley.core.Component> T get(java.lang.Class<T> component)
        Internal and simple way of getting Ashley components. This allows you to add your own components (using ZbeEntity.add(component)) without having to create your own ZbeEntity class See com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.entity.components for built in component types
        Parameters:
        component - component class to get e.g. ResourceComponent.class
        Returns:
        the instance of the component belonging to this entity

      • getMetaData

        public ZbeEntityComponent getMetaData()

      • getCollisionData

      • setSprite

        public ZbeEntity setSprite(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite)
        Set the Sprite component. Note: If you want to change the texture, use setTexture
        Parameters:
        sprite - Texture to set
        Returns:
        current ZbeEntity instance

      • dispose

        public abstract void dispose()
        Parameters:
        autoOrigin - whether the engine should handle the sprite origin automatically
